item.title: Tagbin Empowering Govt & Industries With Digital Experience | ICCC, Digital Museums, Smart traffic management, intelligent transportation management, smart city experience centers, interpretation centers, projection mapping shows

item.title: About Tagbin | ICCC, Digital Museums, Smart traffic management, intelligent transportation management, smart city experience centers, interpretation centers, projection mapping shows
item.description: Tagbin is an experience-driven technology service company established in 2013 by IIT Roorkee Alumni, to design and engineer digital experience for Government and various Industries.

item.title: Dholera Smart City Experience Center
item.description: Dholera Smart City Experience Center. New world of experience for smart city investors is centred on the grounds of BEC (Business and Exhibition Center), Gujarat.

item.title: Multimedia Digital Experience Zone at IFFI 2019
item.description: The Experience Zone traces back the journey of International Film Festival of India from 1952 to its 50th edition in 2019.

item.title: Azadi Ke Diwane Digital Museum at Red Fort
item.description: Azadi ke Diwane is a digital museum built at Red Fort to pay tribute to the freedom fighters who fought till their last breath for India’s freedom. One of the must watch place at Lal Qila.

item.title: Yaad E Jallian Digital Museum at Red Fort
item.description: The ruthless massacre of Jallianwala Bagh is explained through an interactive digital museum named Yaad E Jallian, housed inside the ‘B2 ‘building at Red fort.

item.title: Coca-Cola Experience Center
item.description: Coca-Cola Experience Center - Allowing customers to experience the products through technology at the happiness factory of Coca-Cola. Learn what’s inside your bottle of drink.

item.title: Mercedes Benz Talking Car App
item.description: Keeping in mind some qualitative performance measures, we designed a talking car app for better sales in Mercedes Benz Dealer Showrooms.

item.title: Ami-Kolkata Experiential Museum at Metcalfe Hall
item.description: Ami-Kolkata Experiential Museum at Metcalfe Hall attempts to capture, display and preserve the essence of Kolkata.

item.title: Icons Of Nationalism Digital Museum at NLC
item.description: The Icons Of Nationalism Multimedia Digital Museum is created under the authority of the Ministry of Culture, inside ‘National Library Kolkata’, West Bengal.

item.title: Adidas EQT Shoes Product Launch
item.description: In order to assist a new Adidas EQT shoe launch at the Promenade Mall, New Delhi, Tagbin instill certain elements of creativity into designing the event and other many important engagement details to help the brand pull off the entire event successfully.

item.title: Facebook “Zero Friction Future” Virtual Wardrobe
item.description: At an event in Bangalore, Tagbin installed a setup ‘Zero Friction Future’ for Facebook in collaboration with KPMG. AR technology helped visitors try new clothes just by posing themselves in front of a mirror.

item.title: Multimedia Exhibition on the Life and Philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi, Chandigarh
item.description: The multimedia exhibition on the life and philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi was presented in 3000 square feet of the area using multiple digital and latest technologies celebrating Gandhiji’s 150th birth anniversary.

item.title: Multimedia Exhibition on the Life and Philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi, Siliguri
item.description: The multimedia exhibition on the life and philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi was successfully organized at Siliguri, India.

item.title: Multimedia Exhibition on the Life and Philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi, Katra, J&K
item.description: The multimedia exhibition on the life and philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi at Katra, J&K, was presented in 3000 square feet of the area using multiple digital and latest technologies celebrating Gandhiji’s 150th birth anniversary.

item.title: Multimedia Exhibition on the Life and Philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi, Gorakhpur
item.description: The multimedia exhibition on the life and philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi at Gorakhpur UP, India, was presented in 3000 square feet of the area using multiple digital and latest technologies celebrating Gandhiji’s 150th birth anniversary.

item.title: Multimedia Exhibition on the Life and Philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi, Raipur
item.description: The multimedia exhibition on the life and philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi of Raipur, Chhattisghar, India was presented in 3000 square feet of the area using multiple digital and latest technologies celebrating Gandhiji’s 150th birth anniversary.

item.title: HDFC Liar Mirror - Campaign on Health & Fitness
item.description: Tagbin described about an interactive technique via a LIAR MIRROR in cities like MUMBAI and DELHI. This interactive mirror talked to the people giving them a fun session performing famous movie dialogues.

item.title: Gionee Digital Showroom
item.description: For expanding its market in India, Gionee chose a way to increase sales through multi-retail Digital Showroom showrooms.

item.title: UCB Kid’s Store Launch through VR Game by Tagbin
item.description: UCB with a new product line of fashion launched a new Kid’s Store using a VR Game.

item.title: The Gallery on Lost & Confiscated Items, Purana Qila Museum
item.description: At The Central Antiquity Collection, inside the Purana Qila Monument Complex, a Gallery on Lost and Confiscated Items is designated for display of artifacts recovered by the CBI and Enforcement Directorate of India.

item.title: Uber Safety Drive Campaign
item.description: A reliable and safe driving experience for users-real time immersive and engaging lessons.

item.title: The Textile Gallery
item.description: The new Textile Gallery at Pragati Maidan is an onset of textiles traditional values and perseverance of historical items.

item.title: Mahatma-on-Celluloid Multimedia Digital Exhibition, IFFI 2018
item.description: A multimedia digital exhibition - Mahatma-on-Celluloid, at Kala Academy in Campal-Panaji was created to pay tribute to Mahatma Gandhi at the biggest occasion of - IFFI 2018.

item.title: Multimedia Exhibition on the Life and Philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi, Guwahati
item.description: The multimedia exhibition displayed multiple digital and latest technologies to celebrate Gandhiji’s 150th birth anniversary in Guwahati.

item.title: Multimedia Exhibition on the Life and Philosophy of Mahatma Gandhi, Cuttack
item.description: The multimedia exhibition at Cuttack, was displayed with multiple digital multimedia and latest technologies celebrating Gandhiji’s 150th birth anniversary.

item.title: Digital Multimedia Installations for Hero Morocorp
item.description: We created a Digital Heart by assembling multiple screens & using Raspberry Pie (microcomputer) that displayed numerous videos simultaneously.

item.title: Myntra End of Reason Sale Experience Zone
item.description: Tagbin came up with an idea of organizing an interactive experience zone under there “End of Reason Sale” Campaign to make event a successful affair for people to interact with at Cyber Hub, Gurgaon.

item.title: ONGC Experience Zone at Petrotech, 2016
item.description: Tagbin designed a realistic experience using live interactive Rotoscope. They communicated extreme working conditions at ONGC such as storms, thunder lightning and rain etc., using augmented reality, which hypothetically put audience to experience situations like theirs.

item.title: Kingfisher Virtual Cricket Game
item.description: With the help of VR headsets Tagbin teleported people to live-like cricket pitch and watched them play, cheer and experience something different through the virtual criket game.

item.title: Toyota Safety Experiential Drive
item.description: Tagbin helped in making this event with a real time experience by setting up an interactive 360-degree virtual drive showing pros and cons of the seat belts.

item.title: LAVA – Product Launch through 360 degree selfie booth
item.description: Tagbin implemented an experiential way of product launch by designing a selfie booth which could turn 360° and capture excellent quality pictures.

item.title: VIVO X21 Product Launch
item.description: Tagbin set up a 180-degree photo booth mounted with four walls and 7 cameras on different angles. The cameras would automatically take pictures of the visitors which will be then shared on their social media timeline.

item.title: Microsoft Product Launch
item.description: Tagbin organized an attention-grabbing activity named ‘digital tambola’ to encourage the visitors’ in the event.

item.title: Bajaj Electricals Smart Home Visualization using 3D Projection Mapping.
item.description: Bajaj Smart home automation system with best security and protection for homeowners is visualized through an immersive room with 3D Projection Mapping.

item.title: Bharat Thakur Art – Sculpture Hologram
item.description: Blending art and technology inside the Bharat Thakur Art Exhibition at Indian Habitat Center, Lodhi Road, New Delhi.

item.title: India Today Conclave 2017
item.description: India Today Concalve made an amazing start with an augmented reality presentation on stage, spruced by relevant content & hand gestures.

item.title: The International Exhibition and Conference for IOT
item.description: The International Exhibition and Conference for IOT was based on latest technology available in the market.

item.title: Museum on 70yrs of J&K Saga - National Archives Museum
item.description: A Digital Exhibition in a section of the National Archives Museum was inaugurated by Mahesh Sharma, Minister of Culture and Tourism and Civil Aviation in January 2018.
